original_title: Immigrant Service: Focus on Jesus Duran
overview: After losing her father at an early age, Tina Duran explores the rich history of her father, the story of her ancestors who migrated from Mexico to the United States, and the implications the Vietnam War had on their community.
tagline: A daughter remembers her father and the unifying experience of immigrants: fighting your new home's wars.
title: Immigrant Service: Focus on Jesus Duran
